RumorFact.Text: I used a <color=orange>Ghost Matter Core</color> in the train's <color=orange>main engine room</color> and entered the coordinates from the <color=orange>coordinate relay</color>.

ExploreFact.Text: I was able to get the train's warp functionality up and running! ...At least, I would have if it weren't for the time loop.
<color=yellow>I saw all there was to see</color>!
This train appears to be pulling an entire system behind it on rails!
A Nomai named <color=lightblue>Enji</color> built this train.
It seems the train needs a power source from <color=orange>Locomocean's refinery</color> to enable warp functionality.
Coordinates leading to <color=lightblue>Enji's</color> clan are availible somewhere on <color=orange>Spruce Caboose</color>.
The main corridor leading to the <color=orange>engine room</color> has been sealed shut due to <color=lightblue>Ghost Matter</color> leaking out.

RumorFact.Text: The main corridor leading to the <color=orange>engine room</color> has been sealed shut due to <color=lightblue>Ghost Matter</color> leaking out.

AltText.Text: I managed to get around the sealed corridor by going through the train's whistle!

RumorFact.Text: I gained entry to the <color=orange>engine room</color> through the train's whistle!
A <color=orange>Coordinate Interface</color> will become accessible in the <color=orange>engine room</color> once the <color=orange>core</color> has been acquired.

ExploreFact.Text: I gained entry to the <color=orange>engine room</color> through the train's whistle!
A socket has been prepared for a new type of <color=orange>Advanced Warp Core</color> that <color=lightblue>Enji</color> was developing.
Once the <color=orange>core</color> has been placed in the socket, a <color=orange>Coordinate Interface</color> will become accessible here in the <color=orange>engine room</color>.

The warp pad that <color=lightblue>Enji</color> had been using to enter <color=orange>Locomocean's refinery</color> fell into the sea! It appears an <color=orange>anglerfish</color> ate the warp core it had.

<color=lightblue>Enji</color> tried to find the <color=orange>anglerfish</color> that ate the core with a remote drone and noticed that the <color=orange>lure</color> on one particular fish <color=orange>had gone dark</color> when the drone suddenly ended up inside the <color=orange>refinery</color>!

When <color=lightblue>Enji</color> went to that specific <color=orange>anglerfish</color>, the <color=orange>darkened lure</color> appeared normal to the naked eye and was only visible through the remote drone's <color=orange>camera</color>.
